pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenTelemetry FastAPI Instrumentation=======================================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opentelemetry-instrumentation-fastapi.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opentelemetry-instrumentation-fastapi/This library provides automatic and manual instrumentation of FastAPI web frameworks,instrumenting http requests served by applications utilizing the framework.auto-instrumentation using the opentelemetry-instrumentation package is also supported.Installation------------:: pip install opentelemetry-instrumentation-fastapiReferences----------* `OpenTelemetry Project <https://opentelemetry.io/>`_* `OpenTelemetry Python Examples <https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-python/tree/main/docs/examples>`_
